recipes.title: Burger
instructions: Preheat your grill or pan to medium-high heat.
In a bowl, mix ground beef, breadcrumbs, egg, onion, salt, and pepper.
Form the mixture into burger patties.
Grill or cook patties for about 4-5 minutes on each side until cooked through.
Assemble the burgers on buns with lettuce, tomato, and cheese.

recipes.title: Spaghetti Seafood
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Heat olive oil in a pan, sauté garlic for 1 minute.
Add shrimp and mussels, cook until shrimp turns pink.
Pour in white wine and cook until it reduces slightly.
Add the cooked spaghetti to the pan and toss with seafood.
Sprinkle with parsley, salt, and pepper, and serve.

recipes.title: Avocado Toast
instructions: Toast the slices of bread until golden brown.
Mash the avocado in a bowl and add lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Spread the avocado mixture on top of the toasted bread.
Sprinkle red pepper flakes if desired and serve.

recipes.title: Chocolate Lava Cake
instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C). Grease and flour 4 ramekins.
Melt butter and chocolate together in a microwave or over a double boiler.
Whisk in powdered sugar, then add eggs, egg yolks, and vanilla.
Stir in flour and salt until smooth.
Pour the batter into ramekins, filling them halfway.
Bake for 12-14 minutes, until edges are set but centers are soft.
Let cool for 1 minute, then invert onto plates and serve warm.
